data.title: C Long Snakebite Post Plant Lineup
data.description: Use this safe, yet effective molly lineup in the post plant to secure rounds.

data.title: C Long Default Poison Orb to C Site
data.description: Position yourself like so, and perform a simple jump throw for a strong default orb. This orb is great to use to prevent Defenders from jump-spotting for information, or more added pressure to your site execute.

data.title: Spawn to B Site Post Plant Snakebite
data.description: Here's a great, safe molly lineup you can use from spawn in the post plant situation. You can make micro-adjustments to the lineup to land on the right plant spot, this one covers the left corner.

data.title: A Long Snakebite Post Plant to A Site
data.description: Here's a fast and simple molly lineup you can use during the post plant, you will not be exposed to any Defenders retaking long.
